title: Multi-Lite Pendant Lamp Chrome
body: The combination of adjustable, opposing outer shades and fixed cylindrical inner shades gives this Mobelaris style of Multi-Lite Pendant Lamp the flexibility in customization that complements any living space. The movable hemispherical shade design transforms this pendant lamp into multiple combinations that can be positioned downwards or upwards for asymmetrical diffused lighting. An artistic yet functional approach to lighting that never goes out of style.
